entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
